participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Caring, adventurous, and creative. Loves to explore new things and enjoys spending time with her pets.
participant_1.background: I like listening to folk metal and riding my boat. I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow. I love my mom and spicy food. I am excited to start my new job at McDonald's. My family is important to me, but I'm often too busy with my road trips and cats to see them as often as I'd like.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Dreamy, passionate, and a bit impulsive. Loves to express himself through art and constantly seeks adventure.
participant_2.background: I have a student id and hate paying my bills. I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others. I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars. I love making short films with my camcorder. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.

content.text: Not much, just working on a new comic book.
Cool! I love comics! What's it about?
It's about a group of heroes who are trying to save the world from an evil alien invasion.
Sounds awesome! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's out.
Cool! Do you have any other hobbies besides making comics?
Yeah, I love making short films with my camcorder.
Oh that's cool! I've always wanted to try making a short film.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! Do you have any tips for beginners?
Just start small and don't be afraid to make mistakes.
